Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone connecting two students to show communication over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone uses sound to send messages.
The student can show the students speaking into and listening from the cups to communicate.
The student can label the parts of the string telephone, such as the cups and the string.
The student can add an explanation in their drawing about how sound travels through the string.
